metadata.title: CVE-2012-3462 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in SSSD version 1.9.0. The SSSD's access-provider logiccauses the result of the HBAC rule processing to be ignored in the eventthat the access-provider is also handling the setup of the user's SELinuxuser context.

criterions.comment: sssd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
